baseUrl.description: Base URL for the SDK documentation page.

elements.description: Array of elements defined in the descriptor file.

sdkDocsFixedPath.description: Fixed path to this element used for the section ID on the SDK documentation page. It should be used in cases, when the same element is a child of multiple elements and we want to render it only once.

since.description: Version since the element is available.

until.description: Version until the element is available.

deprecatedSince.description: Version since the element is deprecated.

deprecationNote.description: Deprecation note for the element. Supports Writerside Markdown format.

description.description: Description of the element. Supports Writerside Markdown format.

sdkDocsSupportDetails.description: Support details. It is rendered only in SDK documentation. Use it when additional information about support is needed. Supports Writerside Markdown format.

attributes.description: Array of attributes associated with the element.

containsItself.description: Flag indicating whether the element can contain itself.

childrenDescription.description: Description of child elements. Use it when children elements can't be included in the descriptor documentation (for example, they are dynamic), or additional information is needed. Supports Writerside Markdown format.

references.description: Array of reference page links associated with the element. Supports Writerside Markdown format.

defaultValue.description: Default value for the element, if applicable. Supports Writerside Markdown format.

examples.description: Examples for the element. Supports Writerside Markdown format.

details.description: Additional details about the requirement. Supports Writerside Markdown format.
